synopsis.native: Nora es una joven actriz con un futuro prometedor, los dos pilares de su vida: su abuela Magüi y su madre Cecilia tuvieron grandes carreras en el mundo del espectáculo. Pero Nora descubre que su madre guarda un secreto que la ha marcado de por vida.
synopsis.english: Nora is a young actress with a promising future, the two pillars of her life: her grandmother Magüi and her mother Cecilia had great careers in entertainment. But Nora discovers that her mother keeps a secret that has marked her for life.
